TCName.name: checkPOSPrice
TCName.alldepartments: SELECT NODE_NAME,NODE_ID FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_HIERARCHY where PARENT_NODE='ALL DEPARTMENTS'
TCName.nodevalue: SELECT NODE_NAME,NODE_ID FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_HIERARCHY where PARENT_NODE='nodeval'

TCName.name: checkGrossProfit
TCName.alldepartments: SELECT NODE_NAME,NODE_ID FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_HIERARCHY where PARENT_NODE='ALL DEPARTMENTS'
TCName.nodevalue: SELECT NODE_NAME,NODE_ID FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_HIERARCHY where PARENT_NODE='nodeval'

TCName.name: verifyNearByStore
TCName.alldepartments: SELECT NODE_NAME,NODE_ID FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_HIERARCHY where PARENT_NODE='ALL DEPARTMENTS'
TCName.nodevalue: SELECT NODE_NAME,NODE_ID FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_HIERARCHY where PARENT_NODE='nodeval'

TCName.name: verifyRCReason
TCName.alldepartments: SELECT NODE_NAME,NODE_ID FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_HIERARCHY where PARENT_NODE='ALL DEPARTMENTS'
TCName.nodevalue: SELECT NODE_NAME,NODE_ID FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_HIERARCHY where PARENT_NODE='nodeval'
TCName.lookuptxt: select distinct a.matnr,a.ARTICLE_DESC,c.EAN11,a.mtart,d.lifnr from saap.zwowc_article_master a,saap.zwowc_article_uom b,saap.zwowc_article_ean c, saap.zwowc_article_listing d,saap.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_HIER_XREF e where a.matnr=b.matnr and b.matnr=c.matnr and c.matnr=d.matnr and d.matnr=e.matnr and (d.source_of_supply='1' or d.source_of_supply='2')
TCName.plucode: SELECT a.ean11 from saap.ZWOWC_ART_LIST_PROCURE a,saap.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING b where a.PRIME_VENDOR_FLG='Y' and b.source_of_supply='1'

TCName.name: verifySalesHistory

TCName.nodevalue: SELECT NODE_NAME,NODE_ID FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_HIERARCHY where PARENT_NODE='nodeval'
